extendedInfo.description: A politically themed satire game in which the player flys a spaceship around the galaxy and fires at asteroids that bear a striking resemblance to the most notable American political figures of the day. The player chooses to either side with The Conservative Republic (Republicans) or The Liberal Alliance (Democrats). Many fun upgrades, and 100 levels to enjoy.Republican, Democrat, Politics, Game, Asteroids, Asteroid's, Obama, Romney, Pelosi, Bush, Ryan
